column4: Anyone know how can I can copy stuff of a CD without it saying it's Read only?
Is the CD in the drive? an Image iso? - if you can copy an image to your hard drive makeisof will repacxk it to iso after any changes
Something is wrong. If you absolutely must have the disk image file on your desktop the DD command should do it.
It's just a CD-RW I burnt, put into cd drive and the image came up on desktop...wouldn't let me copy
